patthana21.44:0.2_0: (These should be expanded as in the previous discourse.)
patthana21.44:0.3_0: Next there are buds, gems, and beryl.
patthana21.44:1.1_0: if he doesn’t give rise to confidence in those without it ...”
patthana21.44:2.1_0: if he doesn’t give rise to confidence in those without it ...”
patthana21.44:3.1_0: (These three discourses should be expanded in brief.)
patthana21.44:4.1_2: This is the cause, the reason why the three kinds of determined. ...
patthana21.44:5.1_0: Neights of mouthfuls, they don’t give rise to confidence in those without it.
patthana21.44:5.1_1: (This is the same as the previous discourse.)
